original_text: When all this had ended, the Israelites who were there went out to the towns of Judah, smashed the sacred stones and cut down the Asherah poles. They destroyed the high places and the altars throughout Judah and Benjamin and in Ephraim and Manasseh. After they had destroyed all of them, the Israelites returned to their own towns and to their own property.
korean_text: 이 모든 일이 끝나매 거기에 있는 이스라엘 무리가 나가서 유다 여러 성읍에 이르러 주상들을 깨뜨리며 아세라 목상들을 찍으며 유다와 베냐민과 에브라임과 므낫세 온 땅에서 산당들과 제단들을 제거하여 없애고 이스라엘 모든 자손이 각각 자기들의 본성 기업으로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: the Israelites who were there went out
and cut down the Asherah poles
and the altars throughout Judah and Benjamin
sentences.korean_translation: 유다와 베냐민 온 땅의 제단들을 파괴했으며

sentences.original_text: After they had destroyed all of them
the Israelites returned to their own towns
